texts.label: text
texts.orig: I usually set the time zone on my servers to UTC, but that makes it a bit confusing for me when I use irssi. If you have perl support built into irssi, you can run these commands to alter your time zone within irssi only:
texts.text: I usually set the time zone on my servers to UTC, but that makes it a bit confusing for me when I use irssi. If you have perl support built into irssi, you can run these commands to alter your time zone within irssi only:

texts.orig: For example, I'm in Central Time, so I'd use:
texts.text: For example, I'm in Central Time, so I'd use:

texts.label: text
texts.orig: To update the time in your status bar, simply /whois yourself and you should see the updated time zone. If you want more handy irssi tips, look no further than  irssi's documentation .
texts.text: To update the time in your status bar, simply /whois yourself and you should see the updated time zone. If you want more handy irssi tips, look no further than  irssi's documentation .
